mapper.select: SELECT member_name, member_phone, member_email ,member_address1, member_address2, member_zipcode FROM tb_member WHERE member_id=#{member_id}
SELECT order_no FROM tb_order t_order LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_order_details order_details ON order_details.order_details_order_no = t_order.order_no WHERE order_member_no=#{order_member_no}
SELECT order_no FROM tb_order WHERE order_member_no=#{order_member_no} order by order_no DESC limit 1

SELECT t_order.order_no, t_order.order_name, t_order.order_member_no, t_order.order_date, t_order.order_phone, t_order.order_address, t_order.order_goods_count, t_order.order_goods_price, t_order.order_delivery_fee, t_order.order_delivery_status, t_order.order_merchant_no, goods.category_goods_image_thumb FROM tb_order t_order LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_order_details order_details ON t_order.order_no = order_details.order_details_order_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_goods_sell sell ON order_details.order_details_goods_sell_no = sell.goods_sell_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_category_goods goods ON sell.goods_sell_goods_no = goods.category_goods_no WHERE order_no=#{order_no}

SELECT t_order.order_no, t_order.order_date, t_order.order_goods_price, t_order.order_delivery_status, goods.category_goods_image_thumb FROM tb_order t_order LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_order_details order_details ON t_order.order_no = order_details.order_details_order_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_goods_sell sell ON order_details.order_details_goods_sell_no = sell.goods_sell_no LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_category_goods goods ON sell.goods_sell_goods_no = goods.category_goods_no WHERE order_no=#{order_no} order by order_no DESC limit 1
